verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and שׁוּשַׁ֣ן עֵד֑וּת <S%H7802><s%> upon Shushaneduth מִכְתָּ֖ם <S%H4387><s%> Michtam לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְלַמֵּֽד׃ <S%H3925><s%> to teach בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ ׀ <S%H5327><s%> when he strove אֶ֥ת <S%H854><s%> for אֲרַ֣ם נַהֲרַיִם֮ <S%H763><s%> Aham-naharaim וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֲרַ֪ם צ֫וֹבָ֥ה <S%H760><s%> and with Aramzobah וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> when Joab וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <S%H1516><s%> in the valley מֶ֑לַח <S%H4417><s%> of salt שְׁנֵ֖ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ <S%H2186><s%> thou hast cast us off פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H6555><s%> thou hast scattered אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ <S%H599><s%> us thou hast been displeased תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> O turn thyself to us again לָֽנוּ׃

הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה <S%H7493><s%> to tremble אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Thou hast made the earth פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ <S%H6480><s%> thou hast broken רְפָ֖ה <S%H7495><s%> it heal שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ <S%H7667><s%> the breaches כִי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָֽטָה׃ <S%H4131><s%> thereof for it shaketh

הִרְאִ֣יתָה <S%H7200><s%> Thou hast shewed עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people קָשָׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> hard things הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ <S%H8248><s%> thou hast made us to drink יַ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> the wine תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃ <S%H8653><s%> of astonishment

נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast given לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ <S%H3373><s%> to them that fear נֵּ֭ס <S%H5251><s%> a banner לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס <S%H5127><s%> thee that it may be displayed מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> because קֹ֣שֶׁט <S%H7189><s%> of the truth סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

לְ֭מַעַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <S%H2502><s%> may be delivered יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <S%H3039><s%> That thy beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <S%H3467><s%> save יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> [with] thy right hand [וַעֲנֵנוּ כ] (וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6032><s%> answer ק)

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6944><s%> in his holiness אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה <S%H5937><s%> I will rejoice אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <S%H2505><s%> I will divide שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <S%H6010><s%> the valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <S%H4058><s%> and mete out

לִ֤י גִלְעָ֨ד ׀ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְלִ֬י מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> [is] mine and Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם <S%H669><s%> [is] mine Ephraim מָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> also [is] the strength רֹאשִׁ֑י <S%H7218><s%> of mine head יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah מְחֹֽקְקִי׃ <S%H2710><s%> [is] my lawgiver

מוֹאָ֤ב ׀ <S%H4124><s%> Moab סִ֬יר <S%H5518><s%> caldron רַחְצִ֗י <S%H7366><s%> is My washbowl עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Over אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> over Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <S%H7993><s%> will I cast out נַעֲלִ֑י <S%H5275><s%> my shoe עָ֝לַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> because פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> Philistia הִתְרֹעָֽעִֽי׃ <S%H7321><s%> triumph

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <S%H2986><s%> Who will bring עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> Ai מָצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> me [into] the strong מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Who נָחַ֣נִי <S%H5148><s%> will lead עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> Edom

הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> Yourself אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> [Wilt] not thou O God זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <S%H2186><s%> [which] hadst cast us off וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> [which] didst not go out אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ? and [thou] O God בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> our armies

הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> Give לָּ֣נוּ עֶזְרָ֣ת <S%H5833><s%> us help מִצָּ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> from trouble וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא <S%H7723><s%> for vain תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H8668><s%> [is] the help אָדָם׃ <S%H120><s%> of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> Through God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> we shall do חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> valiantly וְ֝ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> who יָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> for he [it is that] shall tread down צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6862><s%> our enemies
